mapper.sql: fUuid AS uuid, fAlgorithmTestPlanUuid AS algorithmTestPlanUuid, fAlgorithmTestTaskUuid AS algorithmTestTaskUuid, fContactPerson AS contactPerson, fTopTenCount AS topTenCount, fZeroOptimizedCount AS zeroOptimizedCount, fRankChangeRate AS rankChangeRate, fRecordDate AS recordDate, fCreateTime AS createTime, fUpdateTime AS updateTime
mapper.select: INSERT INTO t_algorithm_test_data_statistics ( fAlgorithmTestPlanUuid, fAlgorithmTestTaskUuid, fContactPerson, fTopTenCount, fZeroOptimizedCount, fRankChangeRate, fRecordDate) SELECT atp.fUuid AS 'algorithmTestPlanUuid', att.fUuid AS 'algorithmTestTaskUuid', c.fContactPerson AS 'contactPerson' , SUM(IF(ck.fCurrentPosition BETWEEN 1 AND 10, 1, 0)) AS 'topTenCount', SUM(IF(ck.fOptimizedCount = 0, 1, 0)) AS "zeroOptimizedCount", concat(CONVERT (SUM(IF(ck.fCurrentPosition BETWEEN 1 AND 10, 1, 0)) / count(1)*100,DECIMAL(10,2)),'%') AS 'fRankChangeRate', NOW() FROM t_customer_keyword ck, t_algorithm_test_task att, t_customer c, t_algorithm_test_plan atp WHERE ck.fStatus = 1 AND att.fCustomerName = c.fContactPerson AND ck.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid ANd att.fAlgorithmTestPlanUuid = atp.fUuid GROUP BY ck.fCustomerUuid
